text:
Saving as much money as you can this summer is more important than ever in the face of steadily increasing prices. That being said, the Fourth of July is right around the corner, which means big sales across all categories.

“Three-day weekends are always good for pricey items like mattresses and furniture,” says Trae Bodge, a smart shopping expert. Not only can you expect to save on big-ticket items, but there’s a good chance you’ll run into some extra savings this year as well.

According to Bodge, as a result of changing pandemic shopping habits and supply chain disruptions, some larger retailers are sitting on overstocks in certain categories, including furniture, TVs, and apparel. She predicts that some retailers will discount certain items in addition to sales they already had planned in an effort to clear out inventory. In addition to overstock sales, “something new this year could be sales that take aim at price hikes,” says Bodge. “Brands that can afford to decrease their prices instead of increase could use this tactic to set themselves apart and gain new price-conscious customers.”

Now’s the time to take advantage of this year’s deals. And if your holiday weekend is already full of barbecues and beach days, leaving you little time to shop, don’t worry. These stores are open on the Fourth of July, which is on a Monday this year.

Fourth of July Patio Furniture and Grill Sales

The Home Depot

From now through July 4, you can score major savings on patio furniture and grills at The Home Depot. You’ll find patio furniture starting at $249, and it comes with free delivery. In search of a new grill for all of those upcoming summer cookouts? You’ll get free assembly and delivery on in-store grill purchases of $399 or more, as well as free delivery for online grill orders.

Overstock

Overstock is currently running its Fourth of July Clearance sale in which you can get up to 70% off and free shipping on thousands of items. You can even save an additional 15% on select patio furniture and an extra 20% on indoor and outdoor rugs.

Wayfair

It’s not hard to find great deals on quality patio furniture and grills at Wayfair. Now you’ll save even more during its Fourth of July sale and its Warehouse Clearout event. You’ll be able to score up to 55% off outdoor furniture as well as up to 40% off lawn and garden decor. And if you’re feeling extra festive, you can also save on a selection of Wayfair’s Fourth of July decor.

Spark Grills

Take $100 off any new grill, plus receive a free copy of “The Barbecue Bible,” by Steven Raichlen, when you sign up to receive your promo code via email.

Fourth of July Furniture Sales

Anthropologie

If you’re looking for unique pieces to fill your space, you’ll definitely want to check out Anthropologie’s furniture collection. The company will be offering 30% off select pieces through July 4.

Ashley HomeStore

Whether you’re finally ready to replace an old sofa or looking for new outdoor furniture, Ashley HomeStore will be running several promotions through July 5. The company is offering doorbusters, 12-month special financing, and savings of up to 30% off select items.

Ballard Designs

From now until July 6, Ballard Designs is offering 20% off and free shipping on in-stock items.

House of Noa

New mats can make a world of difference in just about any room in the house. During House of Noa’s Summer Sale, take 25% off some of their “fan-favorite” styles, including Nama Standing Mats and Anywhere Highchair Mats. No promo code is needed.

Macy’s

Save up to 65% off indoor and outdoor furniture during Macy’s Fourth of July Sale.

Fourth of July Mattress Sales

Amerisleep

Not only is Amerisleep offering big savings on all of its award-winning mattresses, but the company is giving shoppers a discount on whole bedroom packages. Through July 11, you can save 30% on adjustable bed bundles, which include a mattress and adjustable base, and 40% off on upholstered bed frames with a mattress purchase. No promo codes are needed. If you just need a mattress, you can take $450 off any mattress with code AS450.

Brooklyn Bedding

American-made, luxury mattress and bedding brand Brooklyn Bedding is offering 25% off in-store and online purchases now through July 12.

GhostBed

GhostBed is offering huge savings between now and July 14. The brand will be discounting its top-rated mattresses up to 30% and giving away two luxury pillows with each mattress purchase. Plus, exclusively for U.S. News readers, if you use code USNews at checkout, you’ll receive 31% off your mattress purchase.

Just need the pillows? You’ll be able to snag them along with all of GhostBed’s bedding for 25% off. And you’ll save a whopping 40% on an adjustable base and mattress bundle. No promo codes are needed.

Mattress Firm

If you’re looking for a traditional mattress rather than a bed-in-a-box, then head to Mattress Firm any time between now and July 12 to scope out its Fourth of July mattress sales. The company is offering up to $500 off on select mattresses from top brands like Sealy, Serta, and Beautyrest. You can also get a free adjustable base valued at up to $499.99 with a qualifying mattress purchase.

Nest Bedding

Through July 18, take 20% off mattresses from Nest Bedding and receive a comfort bundle free with your purchase. Your free comfort bundle will include either two Easy Breather pillows or a luxury sheet set. If you’re just looking to update your bedding, all Nest bedding will be 20% off.

Vaya

Now through July 11, take $300 off any Vaya mattress with code VAYA300.

Zoma

Now through July 11, take $150 off any Zoma mattress with code WIN150.

Fourth of July Appliance Sales

The Home Depot

Whether you’re looking to refresh your kitchen or replace a washer and dryer that’s on the fritz, you’re in luck. Between now and July 4, The Home Depot is offering 25% off select appliances. In addition, through July 13 the company is offering instant savings of up to $750 on select appliances.

Hurom

Hurom is offering up to 30% off on select items until July 24.

Lowe’s

Find top-rated appliances like refrigerators, washing machines, and vacuums from brands like Maytag, Samsung, and Bissel during the Lowe’s Fourth of July sale.

Fourth of July Apparel and Accessories Sales

Cozy Earth

Save up to 25% on bedding and apparel during Cozy Earth’s Fourth of July sale, which runs until July 11. Want to save even more? Treat yourself to some super soft loungewear and bath towels that are 30% off during the sale with code SUMMERLOUNGE.

Franco Sarto

Through July 5, take 25% off sitewide with code FRANCO4TH; you’ll also find up to 60% off shoe styles like sandals and heels. Some exclusions apply.

Kate Spade

Take an extra 30% off sale styles from Kate Spade until July 4 with code EXTRA30.

Kodiak Clothing

Save up to 30% on select lifestyle products from Kodiak Clothing through July 6.

Naot

Stock up on the most comfortable and supportive footwear to get you through the summer and fall. Between July 1 and July 4, Naot will take an additional 30% off sale items.

Fourth of July Food Sales

The Baconer

Between June 28 and July 4, save 15% sitewide on items like XXL bacon steaks, ground bacon, smoked bacon sausage, and more. Use code FIREWORKS at checkout.

Cousins Maine Lobster

Lobster rolls and summer go claw-in-claw, and a Fourth of July picnic is the perfect time to indulge. Cousins Maine Lobster is offering 15% off sitewide with code SUMMER15 now through the end of summer. There are no exclusions, so stock up!

Teton Waters Ranch

Planning a big backyard barbecue? Serve quality grass-fed beef hotdogs and hamburgers that you and your guests will love. Shop between July 1 and July 4 and save 20% off sitewide. Just enter the code BBQ4U at checkout.
